data.text: @socialist_china The US: learning from China? Over our dead body!

@aongishere_alan @socialist_china You're right alan. No western imperialist sh@tbag evil country can copy what the greatest country on the planet is doing re covid. China is the world leader and 80% of the world know that. 🙏🙏🙏
@aongishere_alan @socialist_china @JackBra98521596 They should be isolated and forced to pay reparations.

@bibibomo @socialist_china Yea well if you weld people into their homes here you will meet with fatal consequences.  It also figures China would have the medicine and experience to combat a  bio weapon they created and spread around the world.  Where are our reparations?

@socialist_china I don’t think US can manage a system similar to China’s. There’s not a system nor money to support it. They can’t even allocate money properly to build infrastructure, there’s no way they can put forth a zero-Covid plan of any kind.
@socialist_china When is China sending out those reparations checks?  And an apology?  When?
@socialist_china @JackBra98521596 China should be commended for its Covid measures. I must admit, China’s ability in this cannot be copied or simply transferred to another country.
@socialist_china Number of affected and deaths in mainland: #unknown, cuz #cpc lied people died. https://t.co/pyp9JAQ14e
